fullDescription.intro: This node executes a deep learning model on a compatible external back end that can be selected by the user (e.g. Keras for models that were read in using the Keras reader node).

tab.name: General Settings
tab.option: The deep learning back end which is used to execute the input model for the given input data.
The number of rows that are processed at a time.

tab.name: Inputs
tab.option: For each available input, the following options can be set:
The converter that is used to transform the selected input columns into a format that is accepted by the respective network input specification.
The table columns that are part of the respective network input. The availability of a column depends on the currently selected input converter.

tab.name: Outputs
tab.option: New outputs can be added by clicking the respective button and selecting an output from the list of available outputs. For each selected output, the following options can be set:
The converter that is used to transform the network output into table columns.
The prefix that is used to distinguish between the columns of the different outputs.
